column4: hi i am getting a black screen when i try to install ubunto on my pc. i boot off the cd and hit enter to install and i get a black screen. i have a 8800gts and am trying to install the 64bit version. my processor is 64bit it is a intel q6600. help!:-(
hi i am getting a black screen when i try to install ubunto on my pc.
can eney one help me or not

hi i am getting a black screen when i try to install ubunto on my pc. i boot off the cd and hit enter to install and i get a black screen. i have a 8800gts and am trying to install the 64bit version. my processor is 64bit it is a intel q6600. help!:-(
hi i am getting a black screen when i try to install ubunto on my pc.
at the black screen can you hit ctrl-alt F2 and get a prompt
at start or install hit F6   remove splash and quiet from the boot line, see if that lets you see where it is hanging up
at start or install hit F6  and add before the --  noapic acpi=off        common command line modifiers.. there are many different ones you can try or just get the alternate insatll text cd..
do you get to a screen that says start or install?
if it helps i hear the disk spin still black sceen
Cant do anything unless you get a screen that says start or install...  if not you have a bad dl or a bad burn.
i get that screen but i tryed your f6 thing and it did not work
what happened when you hit f6, does not work is not helpful
i salw a line that red some thing like this file=/cdrom/preseed/ubunto.seed boot=casper initrd=/casper/initrd.gx quiet splash --
Did you try the first suggestion or the second
